Description: Sandstone stela of Marcus; nine lines of Greek text.
Curator's comments: To be published by Grzegorz Ochała [ERO 2021].
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.10, Pl.9)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 9:5 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
